games.summary: CLEVELAND -- —Donovan Mitchellscored 30 points and De’Andre Hunter had 15 of his 27 in the second half, powering theCleveland Cavaliersto a 139-132 victory over theCharlotte Hornetson Monday night. Darius Garlandadded 27 points and 10 assists for Cleveland, which pulled away in the second half to snap a three-game losing streak.
blurbs: ⬆️ Thomas Bryant (CLE) played 20 min (season avg: 9). 10 pts, 1 reb, 1 ast.
📋 Mason Plumlee (CHA) made just his 2nd start this season. 5 pts, 5 reb.

games.summary: BOSTON -- —Jaylen Brownscored 14 of his game-high 31 points in the final quarter and theBoston Celticsrallied from a 20-point, second-half deficit for a 103-95 victory over theIndiana Pacerson Monday night. Pascal Siakamled the Pacers with 25 points, andAndrew Nembhardhad 20.
blurbs: ⬆️ Luka Garza (BOS) played 24 min (season avg: 14). 6 pts, 9 reb, 3 ast.
⬆️ Hugo Gonzalez (BOS) played 37 min (season avg: 13). 6 pts, 11 reb, 1 ast.
📋 Ethan Thompson (IND) made just his 4th start this season. 13 pts, 4 reb.
⬆️ Johnny Furphy (IND) played 23 min (season avg: 12). 3 pts, 5 reb, 2 ast.

games.summary: NEW ORLEANS -- —Zion Williamsonscored 24 points, including 10 straight in a decisive two-minute span of the fourth quarter, to power theNew Orleans Pelicansto a 119-113 victory over theDallas Mavericks, extending the Pelicans’ season-long winning streak to five games. The Mavericks were led by Anthony Davis’ season-high 35 points.

DENVER -- —Jamal Murrayand theDenver Nuggetsraced out to a 19-0 lead in the opening four minutes and tied a franchise record for 3-pointers with 24, cruising to a 135-112 victory over theUtah Jazzon Monday night. He scored 27 points andCameron Johnsonwent 6 of 6 from deep to finish with 20.
blurbs: ⬆️ Jalen Pickett (DEN) played 22 min (season avg: 11). 3 pts, 3 reb, 5 ast.

games.summary: OKLAHOMA CITY -- —Shai Gilgeous-Alexanderscored 31 points, and theOklahoma City Thunderbounced back after two losses in three games to beat theMemphis Grizzlies119-103 on Monday night in a matchup of teams missing several key contributors. It was his 100th consecutive game with at least 20 points, adding to the second-longest streak in NBA history.
blurbs: 🆕 Branden Carlson (OKC) made his first start of the season. 25 min, 11 pts.
📋 Cam Spencer (MEM) made just his 3rd start this season. 14 pts, 5 reb.

games.summary: SAN FRANCISCO -- —Stephen Curryroared back from a rough first half to score 18 of his 26 points after intermission, Jimmy Butler had 21 points and theGolden State Warriorsran away from theOrlando Magicin the second half for a 120-97 win Monday night. blurbs: 📋 Tyus Jones (ORL) made just his 4th start this season. 7 pts, 3 reb.
⬆️ Jase Richardson (ORL) played 22 min (season avg: 8). 11 pts, 4 reb, 0 ast.

games.summary: PORTLAND, Ore. Ausar Thompsonadded 18 points and 12 rebounds for the Eastern Conference-leading Pistons (23-6).Duncan Robinsonscored 15 andCade Cunninghamhad 14 before fouling out early in the fourth quarter.
blurbs: 📋 Kris Murray (POR) made just his 5th start this season. 5 pts, 3 reb.
